title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Interactive Blended Learning for Geospatial Science Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explain a GIS-based problem-solving process in three or more stages using real spatial data
Perform practical map-making exercises of two types using basic tools (e.g., QGIS mobile version) for spatial analysis in mobile environments
Develop one geospatial solution applicable to their work environment based on learned content within two weeks after training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
